amendment.description: To provide for epidemiological studies on Vietnam veterans exposed to Agent Orange and other herbicides used in Vietnam.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2196 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2196 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14937-14938; text: CR S14938) To provide for epidemiological studies on Vietnam veterans exposed to Agent Orange and other herbicides used in Vietnam.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2196 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2196 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
